thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Yasmin Khanbhai
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Yasmin Khanbhai

author: Yasmin Khanbhai
title: Yasmin Khanbhai
text: Abit complicated to figure out if it will be useful or not before you go to Japan (just giving the information on the line names isn't helpful because you have no reference point for if those are the lines you'll be using and where they go), but once over there it was very useful and easy to use/good signs everywhere etc
